solution_line_template: The total number of leaves that fell during the 3 hours is {leaves_first_hour} + {leaves_second_hour} + {leaves_third_hour} = <<{leaves_first_hour}+{leaves_second_hour}+{leaves_third_hour}={total_leaves}>>{total_leaves} leaves.
The average number of leaves that fell per hour is {total_leaves} leaves / {total_hours} hours = <<{total_leaves}/{total_hours}={average_leaves_per_hour}>>{average_leaves_per_hour} leaves per hour.
